title: Ajna Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set - Natural Organic Linen Cotton Acupuncture Mat & Bag - Back Pain Relief, Neck Pain Relief, Stress Reliever, Reflexology, Sciatica, Trigger Point Therapy
description: Ajna Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set - Natural Organic Linen Cotton Acupuncture Mat & Bag - Back Pain Relief, Neck Pain Relief, Stress Reliever, Reflexology, Sciatica, Trigger Point Therapy - Eco Luxe Natural Set
cleaned_text: The incomparable effect of the 5pcs UNMERA acupressure mat set That's what we stand for: Naturality, functionality and quality All fabrics are made of hypoallergenic linen and cotton. Mats are padded with natural coconut fibre pillows as well as our ergonomically designed lumbar cushion are filled with natural and sustainable buckwheat husks. Patented camellia flower spikes made of hypoallergenic HIPS material according to medical standard. flowers are connected to the fabric with special heat welding technology, without adhesives. High-quality workmanship, without chemicals.
